Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Giorgia Elisabetta Rossi on a skiing trip in the Swiss Alps. They spent the weekend skiing and discussing various investment strategies, which laid the foundation for a strong professional relationship.
Giorgia Elisabetta Rossi is a 41 year old and comes from Italy.
She decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Giorgia Elisabetta Rossi has been happily married to Celli since 2016. Giorgia and Celli have 3 children, named Ilaria, Gaia and Livi.
Education Background:
Giorgia received her secondary school diploma from Liceo Musicale Arrigo Boito Parma in 2002.
In 2007, Giorgia graduated from IMT Institute for Advanced Studies Lucca with a degree.
In 2011, she received extra education and graduated from University of Naples Federico II with an additional degree.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 18 years, Giorgia Elisabetta Rossi brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Giorgia Elisabetta Rossi began her professional journey as a Investment Banker at Intesa Sanpaolo S.p.A. in 2007, laying the foundation for future success.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Private Equity Investor at Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena S.p.A. in 2011, further expanding her skill set.
In 2016, she joined UniCredit S.p.A. as a Hedge Fund Manager, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped her grow both personally and professionally.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 160000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
She owns townhouse in Milan, where she resides. It is worth 1054000 EUR.

She purchased villa in Florence, where she spends her holidays. It is valued at 2610000 EUR.
On top of that she inherited a beautiful villa in Modena, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 2766000 EUR.

Following the passing of her mother, a successful Venture Capitalist, she received an inheritance of 2140000 EUR in 2014, which she has used to secure her financial future.
Client Summary: In summary, Giorgia has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
